contentList.content: Your vast experiences make you more likely to succeed in any undertaking. Add your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag> to <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag> that you are not <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficient</LSTag> in.
Your carrying capacity is increased by [1]%.
Through training, you have gained resistance to all forms of damage. Incoming damage is reduced by [1].
Bolster your allies against the dangers that lie ahead.

Hit point maximum increased by [1].

When you roll a 1 on an Attack Roll, Ability Check, or Saving Throw, you can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

You can see in the dark up to [2].
